snippet: Demonstrators outraged by the conduct of departing Kenyan legislators set 221 coffins on fire on Wednesday, causing an inferno outside Parliament’s main entrance.
abstract: Hundreds of demonstrators in Kenya, outraged by conduct of departing legislators, douse 221 coffins with gasoline and set them on fire, causing inferno outside Parliament's main entrance.
lead_paragraph: Demonstrators outraged by the conduct of departing Kenyan legislators set 221 coffins on fire on Wednesday, causing an inferno outside Parliament’s main entrance.

headline.main: Kenya: Lawmakers’ Bonus Pay Attempt Draws Protest
headline.print_headline: Kenya: Lawmakers’ Bonus Pay Attempt Draws Protest
